010-02384-02.productVariation: Midnight Orchid Bezel with Deep Orchid Case and Silicone Band
010-02384-02.pvName: Lily™ - Sport Edition, Midnight Orchid Bezel with Deep Orchid Case and Silicone Band

seo.title: Garmin Lily® - Sport Edition | Smartwatch for women
seo.ogDescription: Lily Sport is a small smartwatch for women with a stylish patterned touchscreen display, health tracking, apps for yoga, walking, cardio, and more.

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
What You'll Love
Battery life (smartwatch mode)Up to 5 days
Pulse Ox blood oxygen saturation Yes (spot-check and optionally in sleep)
Watch display typeLiquid Crystal
Touchscreen
Water rating Swim, 5 ATM

General
Strap materialSilicone
Lens MaterialCorning® Gorilla® Glass 3
Bezel MaterialAnodized aluminium
Case materialFibre-reinforced polymer
Physical size

34.50 x 34.50 x 10.15 mm

Fits wrists with a circumference of 110-175 mm

Weight24.0 g
Display Size1.00” x 0.84” (25.4 mm x 21.3 mm)
Display Resolution240 x 201 pixels
Colour displayNo (16 level greyscale)
Battery lifeUp to 5 days (excluding Pulse Ox sleep tracking). Learn More
Charging methodGarmin proprietary clip charger
Memory/History7 timed activities, 14 days of activity tracking data

Clock Features
Time/date
Automatic daylight saving time
Alarm clock
Timer
Stopwatch

Health & Wellness Monitoring
Wrist-based heart rate (constant, every second)
Daily resting heart rate
Abnormal heart rate alertsYes (high and low)
Respiration Rate (24x7)
FITNESS AGE Yes (in app)
BODY BATTERY™ ENERGY MONITOR
All-day stress
Relaxation reminders
Relaxation Breathing Timer
Breathwork
SLEEP Yes (Advanced)
Hydration
Women's Health

Sensors
Garmin Elevate™ wrist heart rate monitor
Pulse Ox Blood Oxygen Saturation Monitor
Accelerometer
Ambient light sensor

Daily Smart Features
ConnectivityBluetooth®
Smart Notifications
Text response/reject phone call with text (Android™ only)
Connected GPS
Morning report
Calendar
Weather forecasts
Controls smartphone music
Find My Phone
Find My Watch
Pairs with Garmin Connect™ Mobile
Smartphone compatibilityiPhone®, Android™

Activity profiles
GymStrength, Cardio, Elliptical Training, Stair Stepping, Yoga, Pilates and Breathwork
WELLNESSWalking, Pilates, Yoga
INDOOR RUNNINGTreadmill Running
OUTDOOR RUNNINGRunning
CyclingBiking
SwimPool Swimming (Basic)

Safety and Tracking Features
Assistance
LiveTrack

Activity Tracking Features
Step counter
Move alerts (displays on device after a period of inactivity; walk for a couple of minutes to reset it)
Auto goal (learns your activity level and assigns a daily step goal)
Calories Burned
Distance traveled
Intensity minutes
TrueUp™
Move IQ™

Gym & Fitness Equipment
Automatic rep counting

Training, Planning and Analysis Features
Customisable screen(s)
HR zones
HR alerts
HR calories
% HR max
Respiration rate (during exercise) Yoga and Breathwork only
GPS speed and distanceyes (Connected GPS only)
Customizable activity profiles
Auto Lap®
VO2 Max (Run)
Physio TrueUp

Running Features
GPS-based distance, time and paceyes (Connected GPS only)

Cycling Features
Alerts (triggers alarm when you reach goals including time, distance, heart rate or calories)
